description: '''Vetcho Lolas''' (birth name '''Hervé Bié''') is an [[Côte d'Ivoire|Ivorian]] singer, musician, attalakutiste and disc jockey of [[Guéré]] origin in the style [[Coupé-Décalé]]. He also did some [[soukous|rumba]], the [[religious music]] and some [[makossa]]. Owner of three albums, in the summer 2008 he released through his third album a concept called "Shamakuana", which means "danse des bluffeurs"{{citation needed|date=June 2021}}
